text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'o, ruregati'ma enemania vahe'mo'ma Nagri'ma amefima hunenamino, kaza osu havi anumzama agu'afi avre nenteno, kefo avu'avaza nehuno, tanafa'ma runo trakama hania zama avuga tro hunenteno Nagri antahintahima erinaku'ma kasnampa vahetema nevia vahera Nagra Ra Anumzamo'na kenona huntegahue.
